creditline: Gift of Gerald Ray Nelson and Joanne Hogan Nelson
description: recto: central image with study of lettering for Great Lakes Coal and Dock Co. desk calendar, dated April 1919; various figures sketches around central image--mainly soldiers; verso: facial and figure studies of men and one woman at right edge, arms stretched overhead; taped to bright blue mat
medium: Pen and ink and graphite on card
provenance: The artist; his stepdaughter, Joanie Nelson, Vancouver, WA
title: Study for "Great Lakes Coal" calendar (?), recto; Untitled, verso [figure and facial studies]
